Joseph Haydn

Sonata in B-flat major, Hob. XVI:2

before c. 1760 · Landon 11

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 15'

  • 1. Moderato
  • 2. Largo
  • 3. Menuet – Trio

This sonata is possibly spurious.

Recommended editions
